title: Screening metal cation additives driven by differential capacitance for Zn batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4794-4802
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01127A, Paper
Zhengqiang Hu, Fengling Zhang, Feng Wu, Huirong Wang, Anbin Zhou, Yi Chen, Tianyang Xue, Renjie Chen, Li Li
The high-valence metal cation Ce4+ is used to compress the electric double layer on the Zn electrode surface, which improves Zn2+ deposition overpotential and reduces the Zn electrode corrosion rate.
